title: Portfolio
text:
This is a list containing my prior work experience, coding projects, and research experience. Work experiences involve websites for clients, while personal projects are attempts to expand my knowledge about web programming, virtual reality, or or prototyping.
NOTE: Some portfolio items are cross-referenced between work experiences, projects, and research experiences. In other words, some items may appear more than once.

title: Publications
text:

Experiential geosimulation.

(2024).
Evoking embodiment in immersive geosimulation environments.

URL: <a href="https://doi.org/10.1080/19475683.2024.2316601">https://doi.org/10.1080/19475683.2024.2316601</a>, <a href="https://arxiv.org/abs/https://doi.org/10.1080/19475683.2024.2316601">arXiv:https://doi.org/10.1080/19475683.2024.2316601</a>, <a href="https://doi.org/10.1080/19475683.2024.2316601">doi:10.1080/19475683.2024.2316601</a><br>Torrens, P. M., & Kim, R.
(2024).
Using immersive virtual reality to study road-crossing sustainability in fleeting moments of space and time.
<em>Sustainability</em>, <em>16</em>(3).
URL: <a href="https://www.mdpi.com/2071-1050/16/3/1327">https://www.mdpi.com/2071-1050/16/3/1327</a>, <a href="https://doi.org/10.3390/su16031327">doi:10.3390/su16031327</a><br>Torrens, P. M., & Kim, R.
(2025 , August).
Sidewalk2synth: generating synthetic embodied locomotion from real-world streetscapes.
<em>Urban Informatics</em>, <em>4</em>(1).
URL: <a href="http://dx.doi.org/10.1007/s44212-025-00081-z">http://dx.doi.org/10.1007/s44212-025-00081-z</a>, <a href="https://doi.org/10.1007/s44212-025-00081-z">doi:10.1007/s44212-025-00081-z</a><br>Torrens, P. M., Kim, R., & Shinozaki-Conefrey, K.
(2025).
Situationally sensitive path planning.
<em>Algorithms</em>, <em>18</em>(7).
URL: <a href="https://www.mdpi.com/1999-4893/18/7/388">https://www.mdpi.com/1999-4893/18/7/388</a>, <a href="https://doi.org/10.3390/a18070388">doi:10.3390/a18070388</a>


'\n# APA formatter\nstyle = Style()\nformatted = style.format_bibliography(bib_data)\nbackend = Backend()\n\n# Build a dict grouping entries by year\npubs_by_year = defaultdict(list)\n\nfor entry in formatted:\n    # Try to extract year safely\n    try:\n        year = entry.persons[\'author\'][0].year  # rarely works (not stored here)\n    except:\n        # better: get from raw bib data\n        key = entry.key\n        try:\n            year = bib_data.entries[key].fields.get(\'year\', \'No year\')\n        except:\n            year = \'No year\'\n\n    pubs_by_year[year].append(entry)\n\n# Sort years descending\nfor year in sorted(pubs_by_year.keys(), reverse=True):\n    print(f"<h3>{year}</h3>")\n    print("<ul>")\n    for entry in pubs_by_year[year]:\n        html = entry.text.render(backend)\n        print(f"<li>{html}</li>")\n    print("</ul><br>")\n'

title: Hello
text:
My name is Ryan Kim. Pleasure to meet ya!
I’m someone with a robust interest in virtual reality, urban simulation, web application development, and human-computer interaction.
If you’re ever in the need for a VR developer, game designer, or front-end engineer who can provide the necessary skills to develop your simulation/web projects, websites, or web applications, I’m the right person for the job.
